prompt.description:
In the box below, enter a sentence or two about how you intend to use the Open edX platform. If you're not sure yet, share any ideas you have for what the ideal learning platform could look like instead.

We've kept the rubric on this very simple, and you'll need to grade at least 1 other person in order to get your results, and only one person needs to grade you, but you can (and should!) set these thresholds higher on your own courses.

criterion.label: Clarity
criterion.prompt: Was the submission clear? Did it clearly express its ideas and/or plans?

option.label: Excellent
option.explanation: The submission is perfectly clear and expresses the sentiment it was trying to convey clearly to the reader.

option.label: Good
option.explanation: The submission was fully-formed and relatively clear, but could have been expressed in clearer language.

option.label: Poor
option.explanation: The submission is unclear in places, and doesn't make much sense.

option.label: Incomplete
option.explanation: The submission is in some way faulty, such as being a bunch of random letters mashed on a keyboard.

rubric.feedbackprompt: (Optional) What aspects of this response stood out to you? What did it do well? How could it be improved?
